content:
Forge 19.1 for STU3 (DevDays Boston 2018 Edition) is now available for download from https://fire.ly/forge/.

This release is a minor Forge update that fixes a number of issues that were introduced in the previous 18.6 release.

Change log: https://simplifier.net/organization/firely/news/51

If you find a new issue or would like to submit a feature request, please contact us at forge@fire.ly.

Or come and join us at FHIR DevDays in Boston next week!
